pageProduct.name: Amolin Baby Cream for Nappy Rash Tube 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Amolin Baby Cream is a nappy rash cream with oil rich base for lasting protection.

A specially formulated oil-rich cream that soothes and calms to help give your baby lasting protection and relief from nappy rash, chafing and dry skin.

 - Helps provide relief from nappy rash

 - soothes and calms baby skin

Size: 100g

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

CAUTION

For external use only. Do not use in the eyes. Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. To open tube, lift and remove protective seal under screw-cap lid.

Ingredients

Almond Oil 28.5mg/g, Zinc Oxide 16mg/g.

Directions

Apply lightly and rub in after every nappy change.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.
